accelerate.name: Accelerate
accelerate.description: Greatly increases the agility of a single ally for 4 to 7 turns.

blunt.name: Blunt
blunt.description: Greatly decreases the attack of a single enemy for 2 to 5 turns. The higher the caster's wisdom, the more likely the spell is to succeed.

buff.name: Buff
buff.description: Greatly increases the defence of a single ally for 4 to 7 turns.

burning_breath.name: Burning Breath
burning_breath.description: Lets out an exhalation of immobilisation that paralyses all enemies for 2 to 5 turns.

chilly_breath.name: Chilly Breath
chilly_breath.description: Inflicts medium ice-elemental breath damage on all enemies.

confusion_attack.name: Confusion Attack
confusion_attack.description: Damages a single enemy and occasionally confuses it for 2 to 5 turns.

cool_breath.name: Cool Breath
cool_breath.description: Inflicts minor ice-elemental breath damage on all enemies.

crack.name: Crack
crack.description: Inflicts minor ice-elemental spell damage on a single enemy.

crackle.name: Crackle
crackle.description: Inflicts medium ice-elemental spell damage on a all enemies.

crag.name: Crag
crag.description: Inflicts minor earth-elemental spell damage on a single enemy, but not until the following round.

dazzle.name: Dazzle
dazzle.description: Bedazzles all enemies for 2 to 5 turns. The higher the caster's wisdom, the more likely the spell is to succeed.

decelerate.name: Decelerate
decelerate.description: Greatly decreases the agility of a single enemy for 4 to 7 turns. The higher the caster's wisdom, the more likely the spell is to succeed.

deceleratle.name: Deceleratle
deceleratle.description: Greatly decreases the agility of all enemies for 4 to 7 turns. The higher the caster's wisdom, the more likely the spell is to succeed.

deep_breath.name: Deep Breath
deep_breath.description: Inhales long and deep, raising the damage inflicted by the user's next breath attack.

demon_demeaner.name: Demon Demeaner
demon_demeaner.description: Inflicts heavy slashing damage on monsters in the demon family.

dim.name: Dim
dim.description: Greatly decreases the wisdom of a single enemy for 4 to 7 turns. The higher the caster's wisdom, the more likely the spell is to succeed.

drain_magic.name: Drain Magic
drain_magic.description: Absorbs some MP from a single enemy.

fire_breath.name: Fire Breath
fire_breath.description: Inflicts minor fire-elemental breath damage on all enemies.

fizzle.name: Fizzle
fizzle.description: Prevents all enemies from casting spells for 4 to 7 turns. The higher the caster's wisdom, the more likely the spell is to succeed.

flame_breath.name: Flame Breath
flame_breath.descriptionn: Inflicts medium fire-elemental breath damage on all enemies.

gust_slash.name: Gust Slash
gust_slash.description: Inflicts minor wind-elemental slashing damage on a single enemy.

heal.name: Heal
heal.description: Restores 28 or more HP to a single ally.

helm_splitter.name: Helm Splitter
helm_splitter.description: Damages a single enemy and occasionally lowers its defence for 4 to 7 turns.

insulate.name: Insulate
insulate.description: Greatly reduces the damage received from breath attacks by a single ally for 4 to 7 turns.

kabuff.name: Kabuff
kabuff.description: Greatly increases the defence of all allies for 4 to 7 turns.

kacrackle_slash.name: Kacrackle Slash
kacrackle_slash.description: Inflicts minor ice-elemental slashing damage on a single enemy.

kadim.name: Kadim
kadim.description: Decreases the wisdom of all enemies for 4 to 7 turns. The higher the caster's wisdom, the more likely the spell is to succeed.

kamikazee.name: Kamikazee
kamikazee.description: Kill all enemies, but at the cost of the caster's life. The caster cannot be resurrected in the same battle. The higher the caster's MP, the more likely the spell is to succeed.

kasap.name: Kasap
kasap.description: Greatly decreases the defence of all enemies for 4 to 7 turns. The higher the caster's wisdom, the more likely the spell is to succeed.

knuckle_sandwich.name: Knuckle Sandwich
knuckle_sandwich.description: Focuses strength in order to inflict heavy damage on a single enemy in the next turn, ignoring their defence attribute.

lightning_slash.name: Lightning Slash
lightning_slash.description: Inflicts minor electrical slashing damage on a single enemy.

matter_scatterer.name: Matter Scatterer
matter_scatterer.description: Inflicts heavy slashing damage on monsters in the material family.

midheal.name: Midheal
midheal.description: Restores 76 or more HP to a single ally.

miracle_slash.name: Miracle Slash
miracle_slash.description: Inflicts slashing damage on a single enemy. Approximately half the amount of damage inflicted is restored to the user as HP. Can heal up to a maximum of 200 HP.

nature_nerfer.name: Nature Nerfer
nature_nerfer.description: Inflicts heavy slashing damage on monsters in the nature family.

numb.name: Numb
numb.description: Paralyses a single enemy for 2 to 5 turns. The higher the caster's wisdom, the more likely the spell is to succeed.

oomph.name: Oomph
oomph.description: Greatly increases the attack of a single ally for 2 to 5 turns.

oomphle.name: Oomphle
oomphle.description: Increases the attack of all allies for 2 to 5 turns.

ping.name: Ping
ping.description: Greatly increases the wisdom of a single ally for 4 to 7 turns.

poison_attack.name: Poison Attack
poison_attack.description: Damages a single enemy and occasionally poisons it.

sandstorm.name: Sandstorm
sandstorm.description: Whips up a dense cloud of dust that lowers the accuracy of enemy attacks for 2 to 5 turns.

sap.name: Sap
sap.description: Greatly decreases the defence of a single enemy for 4 to 7 turns. The higher the caster's wisdom, the more likely the spell is to succeed.

sleep_attack.name: Sleep Attack
sleep_attack.description: Damages a single enemy and occasionally puts it to sleep for 2 to 5 turns.

slime_squisher.name: Slime Squisher
slime_squisher.description: Inflicts heavy impact damage on monsters in the slime family.

snooze.name: Snooze
snooze.description: Puts a single enemy to sleep for 2 to 5 turns. The higher the caster's wisdom, the more likely the spell is to succeed.

splash.name: Splash
splash.description: Inflicts medium water-elemental spell damage on a single enemy.

splish.name: Splish
splish.description: Inflicts minor water-elemental spell damage on a single enemy.

squelch.name: Squelch
squelch.description: Cures all allies of poison or severe poison.

stones_throw.name: Stone's Throw
stones_throw.description: Inflicts minor earth-elemental spell damage on a single enemy.

sweet_breath.name: Sweet Breath
sweet_breath.description: Lets out an exhalation of relaxation that puts all enemies to sleep for 2 to 5 turns.

swoosh.name: Swoosh
swoosh.description: Inflicts medium wind-elemental spell damage on all enemies.

tongue_bashing.name: Tongue Bashing
tongue_bashing.description: Savagely slathers a single enemy with slimy saliva, stunning it and reducing its defence attribute to 1.

weird_dance.name: Weird Dance
weird_dance.description: A dance that decreases the MP of a single enemy.

whack.name: Whack
whack.description: Kills a single enemy instantly. The higher the caster's wisdom, the more likely the spell is to succeed.

wind_sickles.name: Wind Sickles
wind_sickles.description: Inflicts minor wind-elemental damage on a single enemy.

woosh.name: Woosh
woosh.description: Inflicts minor wind-elemental spell damage on all enemies.

zap.name: Zap
zap.description: Inflicts minor electrical spell damage on a single enemy.

zapple.name: Zapple
zapple.description: Inflicts medium electrical spell damage on all enemies.
